text:
Nice place to jog and exercise but then tracks are filled with mud after some showers and there's 2 exercise corners, the older ones needs revamp as chin up bars and sit up benches are well used and dirty, hopefully they can renovate this place as its quite popularise by the neighbourhood folks here. Thanks You.

As at 23 Oct 2022 update, there's no much changes at this park as floorings are still muddy after rain.

The park is actually not very big but it has plenty of exercise facilities. Trees are huge so they provide plenty of shade. Definitely one of the better parks in the area. Portable toilets are available in case of emergency.
Pleasant little oasis with eclectic features like the walkway-bridges. Would be great if there were a small area cordoned off to serve as a dog run for the many pet Lovers who live in the area.

I grow up here since 1985 till 2016. Missed this place. Can jog, exercise, play soccer, group activity. Mini carpark. Located at Serangoon Avenue 4. My third home. Open field are use for National Day makan. Padang Malam. 7 month getai performance.

Located at Open Field@Blk 217 serangoon Ave 4. Participated the Serangoon National Dinner organised by Serangoon CC. Guest of Honour Mr Lawrence Wong , Lim Boon Heng. A glamorous evening event with 150 tables participants. With delicious foods, accompanied by some entertainment such as community dances, NDP songs, The Pledge and finally the Singapore National anthem . 👍😋🍻🎉🤓🤚🏻🍷
